# GalleryPlanner

> Visualize your perfect gallery wall before you hang a single nail.

## Description
GalleryPlanner is an interactive web application for planning gallery wall layouts. It allows users to visualize frame arrangements on a virtual wall, supporting customized wall dimensions (including staircases), real photos, and precise measurements.

## Core Features
- **Smart Layout**: AI-assisted auto-arrangement (Masonry, Grid, Skyline).
- **Virtual Inventory**: Import real photo sizes and frames.
- **Privacy Focused**: Runs entirely in-browser (local-first); images are not uploaded to a cloud.
- **Tools**: Precision canvas with snapping, pan/zoom, and exact coordinates.
- **Output**: Export installation PDF guides and high-res print bundles.

## Documentation
- **Help Center**: https://gallery-planner.com/help
- **Privacy**: https://gallery-planner.com/privacy
- **Source**: built with React 19, Vite, TypeScript.

## Links
- **App**: https://gallery-planner.com/app
- **About**: https://gallery-planner.com/about
